listitem.para: This option is ignored for now. It used to determine if Opportunistic Encryption will be enabled. Opportunistic Encryption is the term to describe using IPsec tunnels without prearrangement. It uses IPSECKEY or TXT records to announce public RSA keys for certain IP's or identities. However, this feature is going to be moved outside of the pluto IKE daemon into a separate process, more closely tied with a local DNS(SEC) server. The default value used to be no, so this should not affect anyone. Contact the developers if you are interested in working on the re-implementation of OE.
